.. role::  raw-html(raw)
   :format: html

.. .. |Dbox|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">cuga</span>`
.. .. |Cbox|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">rugauga</span>`
.. .. |nbsp| replace:: :raw-html:`&#x00A0;`

.. |targetRNA-0|  replace:: 18S rRNA
.. |target-0| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">taa<a href="../18s-tab.html#snRcnk02420-1_18S" title="18S target">T</a>acatgct</span>`

.. |targetRNA-1|  replace:: 25S rRNA
.. |target-1| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">tg<a href="../18s-tab.html#snRcnk02420-1_25S" title="25S target">A</a>ttttgatt</span>`
.. |targettable-1| replace:: :raw-html:`<a href="snoRNAs/snrcnk02420pseu-targets.html#snrcnk02420-1-d-guide">here</a>`


.. |extrBP-2|  replace:: 18S rRNA 
.. |accBP-2| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm"><a href="../18s-tab.html#acc_cnk02420-2_18S" title="18S complimentarity">ggctttggctggt</a></span>`
.. |extr-2|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">actggttagagcc</span>`
   
.. |targetRNA-2|  replace:: 18S rRNA
.. |target-2| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">aag<a href="../18s-tab.html#cnk02420-2_18S" title="18S target">C</a>catgcatgt</span>`
.. |targettable-2| replace:: :raw-html:`<a href="snoRNAs/snrcnk02420pseu-targets.html#snrcnk02420-2-d-guide">here</a>`

- CNK02420, annotated as a pseudo-gene, produces a transcript with two intronic box CD snoRNAs, as CNAG_13018

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snRcnk02420_h99_igb.png
   :name: snrcnk02420_h99_igb
   :align: left
   :width: 1389 px
   :height: 646 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%

- The two box CD snoRNAs appear to be specific for *Cryptococcus*

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/CNK02420-align.png
   :name: cnk02420-align
   :align: left
   :width: 1709 px
   :height: 945 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%

- Conserved regions could form accessory base pair interactions with (pre-)rRNA or contribute to a secondary structure

.. rst-class:: mononote

- snRcnk02420-1_intronic-boxCDsnoRNA-89nt-in-CNK02420pseu-as-CNAG_13018

- Possible target D' guide in |targetRNA-0|\ : |target-0|
- Possible target D guide in |targetRNA-1|\ : |target-1|
- No orthologues found
- Alternative targets with full complimentarity to the D-guide are listed |targettable-1| and shown `below <targets-1D_>`_

snRcnk02420-2
=============


- snRcnk02420-2_intronic-boxCDsnoRNA-82nt-in-CNK02420pseu-as-CNAG_13018

- Possible target D' guide in |targetRNA-2|\ : |target-2|
- Accessory interaction via |extr-2| upstream of the D-box can occur with |accBP-2| in |extrBP-2|
- No orthologues found
- Alternative targets for the D-guide are listed in |targettable-2| and shown `below <targets-2D_>`_
